revised_title: Researches towards Establishing a Theory of the Dispersion of Light No. IV
tldr: The author, Baden Powell, investigates the dispersion of light using various methods, including those of M. Cauchy and Mr. Kelland. He compares observed refractive indices with the results of Mr. Kelland's theory in the cases of sulphuret of carbon and oil of Cassia, finding a close agreement between the results of observation and theory.
